items.title: Disease Search By Symptoms - Healthcare Websites Mining
items.description: A complete end-end to applications which allows users to Search disease by typing one or more symptoms in the search box. It also allows users find effective drug for discovered disease.
ulist: Developed web crawlers to scrap structured data from healthcare discussion forums and drug reviews websites.
Created Java web application and REST API endpoints for data indexing and searching.
Improved search accuracy by more than 9% by incorporating information extraction technique (NER) and Bio-medical synonyms.
Collaborated with other team members to successfully deliver project milestones on time.

items.title: Bigtable database implementation using Relational DBMS
items.description: Single-node Bigtable implementation by using Relational DBMS components as building blocks.
ulist: Extended Minibase persistent Heapfile and Tuple data structures to implement Bigtable maps.
Leveraged in-memory data structures to optimize batch insertion and minimized disk-page access significantly.
Optimized Heapfile page layout and B+ Tree index structure to support flexible data clustering and querying.

items.title: Multimedia information retrieval system
items.description: A Supervised Machine Learning project using the 11k Hands dataset.
ulist: Implemented image feature extraction, mapped images to multi-dimensional vector space for image similarity computation.
Improved image search performance by 30% by implementing Dimensionality Reduction techniques.
Implemented relevance feedback using Personalized Page Rank in the image retrieval system.
